1.content: So, let's choose how this will go!
1.title: Choosing!

choices: They come across a strange digimon
A maternity store right in the middle of the forest
11.content:
We join our digidestined heroes as they were busy tracking trough another plain of the digital world. Due to how strange and unstable this world was, plus a lack of a map it was hard to say in which part they were, since originally they recalled being in what seemed like the frozen tundra, but the next day found themselves in what seemed like a lush forest.

Deciding now would be a best place to take a break, they made camp with Izzy looking trough his laptop.

"Ugh....This place is REALLY starting to drive me nuts..." Izzy commented, rubbing his hair with frustration.

"Yeah, still don't get how it supposed to function." Mimi added, as she took a sip from her canteen and then passed it to Palmon

While the rest of the group was busy resting, both Kari, Gatomon, TK and Patomon decided to do some scouting ahead to see if they can find some food, maybe even some sort of landmark so they wouldn't get lost in the forest. As they traced trough the forest, they suddenly came across.
11.title: Digimon S1

choices: Kari is pregnant and both she and Gatomon have a rapid pregnancy
Kari is pregnant and both she and Gatomon have a normal pregnancy
Kari isn't pregnant but Gatomon has a rapid pregnancy
111.content:
In a clearing in the forest they find a strange human-like digimon. It had creamy white skin, long black hair and probably stood around 5 feet tall but was sitting down so it was hard to tell. The most notable and strangely human properties however were that it seemed to have large breasts resting atop of a massive round, pregnant looking tummy with a popped out belly button.

"I don't like the looks of this." said Gatomon backing away from the creature. "Why? It doesn't look to dangerous to me" Said Kari approaching the stranger. "KARI WAIT!"

The strange digimon, noticing the approaching girl, stood up and squeezed its own belly, exhaling a pink smoke cloud that quickly engulfed Kari.

Gatomon exclaimed diving forward to try and pull back her friend. Unfortunately for both of them, Gatomon was too late and only ended up getting caught in the smoke too. By the time the cloud had dissipated the digimon was gone. "Kari, do you know what just happened to us?" Gatomon asked, looking absolutely defeated. "No, what?" Kari responded, confused about why Gatomon seemed so serious, the attack certainly didn't hurt. "That was preggomon. While digimon normally don't reproduce by getting pregnant, we still have male and females. That's where preggomon comes in. That gas attack gets any female digimon that inhales it pregnant." Gatomon was already rubbing her own stomach, knowing what was coming.

"Just digimon, or humans too?" Kari asked, shaking in fear while holding her stomach. "I don't know" was all Gatomon could manage.
111.title: They come across a strange digimon

1111.content:
Suddenly though, before either of them could say a word or even blink they felt something strange inside their bellies and then right before their eyes their bellies began to grow and balloon. Gatomon let out a loud "mrow!" as she tried to push her belly back in, but that wasn't gonna help at all, while Kari's stomach grew pushing against her outfit and forcing the girl to arch her back during this.

Once their growth stopped, both of them looked like they swallowed beachballs and both of them felt rather heavy and thus had to arch their backs to stand properly.

"Oooo..oo..N-Noo.." gatomon said, huffing as she stroked her belly slowly "G-Guess it does affect humans as well.."

"Ooo..I..I'm SO huge!" Kari exclaimed, her face burning the darkest shade of red "W-We both are huge!"

"Thanks for pointing out the obvious Kari" Gatomon said, blushing a deep red "W-What are we gonna do now?"

Kari bit her lower lip, rubbing her massive orb while she thought what they should do next.
1111.title: Kari is pregnant and both she and Gatomon have ...

choices: They manage to catch up with the Preggomon
11111.content:
"W-Well, let's try and capture that Preggomon!" She said, an began to waddle forward "M-Maybe she can turn us back to normal!"

Gatomon sighed softly, as she waddled after Kari. Following the path wasn't easy, because of their preggo girths, forcing them to move slowly and arch their backs. Plus, they had to take a break every five minutes. During their waddling, Kari would slowly rub her belly as she didn't wanna speak it outloud, but the sensation of being so big was starting to actually grow on her and she was wondering if Gatomon was feeling the same. Probably she'd ask her later or after they capture the strange digimon.

As they stopped to take a breather by a nearby lake, Kari sighed taking a few sips of water as she then looked up and gasped seeing the Preggomon on the other side. Both she and Gatomon gave chase once again, going much deeper into the strange forest where the Digimon was headed too.

"Swear when I get her, I'll burst her gut!" Gatomon hissed, brandishing her claws.

"Gatomon! No hurting her until we get some answers!"
11111.title: Go after the preggomon

1113.content:
Just then, Gatomons belly suddenly fwoomped out before Kari's eyes, making the feline look like she had a hefty litter in her and forcing her to blush the darkest shade of red possible.

"Oooo....A..An here it is..." She whispered, blushing as she arched her back "Ooof..S-So many."

Kari gasped from this, as she began to slowly rub Gatomons massive belly, making the feline purr a little bit and even giggle.

"HEhe...Y-You look like a big kitty balloon" Kari said in a teasing fashion, then smooched Gatomons belly "Rather cute I must say~"

"W-Well...G-Glad you're enjoying this" Gatomon whispered, her blush going deeper as she gave some happy purrs.

Kari smiled, rubbing Gatomons belly some more until what seemed several hours before they finally stopped.

"S-Soo...A-Any idea what are we gonna do now, Kari?" Gatomon asked, drumming her tum gently.

1121.content:
"Put it on...You know you want tooo~" The voice whispered softly in his ear.

Biting his lower lip, TK quickly grabbed the swimsuit and made his way towards the changing room. As he quickly undressed, he slipped on the bikini and then posed infront of the mirror, it sat simply perfectly on him and looked like it was tailored made for the little kid. As he smiled, TK meeped feeling strange happening to him, as the voice began to whisper.

"GRow....Grow....grow..." it said as TK felt something happening in his stomach.

Then, his belly began to grow and push out before his very own eyes. However, TK wasn't panicking instead he smiled sweetly as his hands traveled towards his expanding tum, carefully caressing it as it ballooned before his very own eyes. Bigger and bigger it has gotten, plus feeling heavier forcing the boy to arch his back as he reached the size of four children, the vocie whispering again.

"Be....a beautifull...mother....full of life...forever~"

"Beautiful...mother..." TK repeated, as a gentle glow came from his eyes as he kept rubbing his big and firm belly ever so slowly "Yes....I should be beautiful and pregnant~"

Gabumon meeped, feeling the jewel embed in his fuzzy tum. Before he knew what was going on, Gabumon felt a strange warmth in his stomach as the voice has returned once again.

"Shhhh...don't panic...relax...calm down...let it grow...grow biiiig...grow full~" The voice whispered softly in his ear, as Gabumons paws went to his belly.

Letting out a soft moan, Gabumon felt his belly balloon and expand in his paws, and...and it felt..soo good. No, it felt beyond good...it felt amazing, almost like he was born to be like this. His tum meanwhile kept growing bigger and bigger, reach the size of eight babies and only then stopping as Gabumon let out another loving moan, giving his tum slow pats and rubs.

"Daaanceee...perform...be freee...be happy~" The voice murmurred in his ear once again.

Smiling at that, Gabumon began to wiggle his hips from side to side, as a rhythmic belly dancer melody played in his mind.
